title: [H-01] FULL-Restricted Users Can Still Deposit
summary: The report describes a bug in the deposit flow that does not properly enforce the FULL_RESTRICTED_STAKER_ROLE check. This allows restricted users to bypass compliance rules when making a deposit. The bug is caused by the _mint function setting the first parameter for _update to be address 0, which bypasses the role check. The team has fixed the issue.
